title: Ticket #3958: nordugrid_gahp consumes 100% CPU
description: When run with Globus libraries from OSG, main() in nordugrid_gahp spins in a tight loop calling globus_poll_blocking(). As we discovered with the gahp_server in #2345, globus_poll_blocking() doesn't block in some situations (when Globus is using pthreads). The fix from that ticket needs to be applied to the nordugrid_gahp as well.
